sourcesContent:
import { formatISO9075 } from "date-fns"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import './Post.css'; export default function Post({ _id, title, summary, cover, content, createdAt, author, upvotes, downvotes }) { return ( <>

{title}

{author.username} {formatISO9075(new Date(createdAt))}

{summary}

▲ {upvotes} ▼ {downvotes}
); }
